title: 关于工业
author: pp2576616421
txt_content: 工业2怎么把分子重组仪做依矿的电力设置加大

replies.author: TLCAB
replies.txt_content: 服务器或客户端.minecraft/Config/AdvancedSolarPanel_MTRecipes.cfg文件内修改~

replies.author: pp2576616421
replies.txt_content:
TLCAB 发表于 2020-1-19 13:15
服务器或客户端.minecraft/Config/AdvancedSolarPanel_MTRecipes.cfg文件内修改~
具体在哪

replies.author: TLCAB
replies.txt_content:
pp2576616421 发表于 2020-1-20 15:13
具体在哪
很清楚了,服务器或者客户端
路径:XXX\.minecraft\config

replies.author: q13547900
replies.txt_content:
就是你客户端的文件夹/.minecraft/Config/AdvancedSolarPanel_MTRecipes.cfg
很好找的 最好用Notepad++打开

replies.author: wavether123
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 wavether123 于 2020-1-20 21:54 编辑 

服务器或客户端.minecraft/Config/AdvancedSolarPanel_MTRecipes.cfg文件内

minecraft:iron_ingot@*; ic2:misc_resource#iridium_ore; 9000000    这一条是铁变铱，后面那个数就是需求电量
不过数值最大是多少我不知道
